item.title: Else without if error :|
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“lesterknome, post:8, topic:267291”][code]
case 162:
if (actionTimer == 0) {
actionTimer = 30;
if (playerLevel[6] >= 93)
stillgfx(83, absY, absX);
for (int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) {
strPot = true;
strPotTimer = 90;
cba = abc / 10;
abc2 = cba * 2;
if (abc2 <= 1) {
abc2 = 2;
}
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
break;
}
inCombat();
attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1);
setAnimation(1979);
txt4 = “Taste Vengeance!”;
string4UpdateRequired = true;
RemoveAllWindows();
sendMessage(“Your opponent is hit with vengeance!”);
} else {
sendMessage(“You must wait 30 seconds before casting vengeance again!”);
}
} else if (playerLevel[6] <= 93) {
sendMessage(
“You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell.”);

                    }
	break;

[/code]
haven’t coded in ages, lets see if i’m right[/quote]

Nope, 100 errors

Got a new problem.
R X’s was right but now when I go on a new acc (lvl 3) it does the emote and says
“You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell.”
“Your opponent is hit with the power of vengeance.”

So im guessing it still works but just sends the message?

item.title: Else without if error :|
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

This is the 2nd time I have to post about this error trying to update vengeance.
SOMEONE PLEASE EXPLAIN HOW TO FIX THIS WITHOUT ASKING FOR HELP!

Heres my code:

case 162:
                    if (actionTimer == 0) {
                            actionTimer = 30;
			    if (playerLevel[6] >= 93)
                            stillgfx(83, absY, absX);
                            for (int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) {
                                strPot = true;
                                strPotTimer = 90;
                                cba = abc / 10;
                                abc2 = cba * 2;
                                if (abc2 <= 1) { 
                                    abc2 = 2;
                                }
                                updateRequired = true;
                                appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                                break;
                            }
                            inCombat();
                            attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1);
                            setAnimation(1979);   
                            txt4 = "Taste Vengeance!";
                            string4UpdateRequired = true;
                             RemoveAllWindows();
             sendMessage("Your opponent is hit with vengeance!");
             } else {
                  sendMessage("You must wait 30 seconds before casting vengeance again!");
	} else if (playerLevel[6] <= 93) {
                    sendMessage(
                            "You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell.");

                        }
		break;

it worked without the level requirement but now I added it and I get an else without if eror.

SOMEONE PLEASE EXPLAIN TO ME WHY IT SAYS THIS SO I CAN FIX THIS LATER ON WITHOUT HAVING TO POST!

Read full topic
